Get Your Embroidery Quote

Upload your logo or design and tell us about your embroidery project. We'll provide a detailed quote within 24 hours.

Upload your logo or design (JPG, PNG, PDF, AI, EPS)

What Happens Next?

1

Submit Your Request

Fill out the form with your project details and upload any design files.

2

We Review Your Project

Our team reviews your requirements and assesses the best approach for your project.

3

Receive Your Quote

Get a detailed quote with pricing, timeline, and next steps within 24 hours.

4

Approve & Start

Once approved, we'll create samples and begin production of your order.

Design Tips

  • High-resolution logos work best (300 DPI or higher)
  • Vector files (.ai, .eps, .svg) are ideal for embroidery
  • Consider thread color limitations for complex designs
  • Simple designs often look more professional
